head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths TURRET, HON. JACK

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths TURRET, HON. JACK

block.p: TURRET--Hon. Jack, passed peacefully on June 16, 2007. Adored widower of Rita, beloved father of Ira and David and daughters-in-law Josette and Nancy, cherished grandfather of Jonathan, Daniel and Jason, devoted brother of Bernard, Hy and Gertrude. Services Monday, June 18, 2007, 11:45am, Riverside Memorial Chapel, 76th and Amsterdam Ave.

TURRET--Hon. Jack, passed peacefully on June 16, 2007.
